topic.title: FREEMLT - We believe that true free speech in Malta should not depend on the corrupt Maltese Government and failing Maltese institutions for protection after the car bomb assassination of journalist Daphne Caruana Galizia. Kindly help host Malta's 1st censorship-proof site.
MALTALK - New freespeech chatroom for Malta
topic.body:
PLS help us out with open port hosting. :) We are having trouble opening ports. Thank you.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MALTALKxyXgvWSqZkcdjsh4LUqqL2bKFe/#Publish

1_18zH6Av8AX7XdEW9PNFeb8QCs4QdMTVaYB.body:
> [akito](#comment_13_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): Had the same problem.

Thanks. We suspect it could be a problem of closed ports. Would that affect commenting?
